description.p: The T-shirt shows a small logo as pocket print on the front side and is empty on the back.
The T-shirt shows a small logo as pocket print on the front side and a larger version of the logo with the URL of the web page on the back.
The T-shirt shows a small logo as pocket print on the front side and the preamble of the GPL on the back.
